steps.name: user click the Course Deployments navigation panel and click New Course Deployment button
select Course name and Course Connectors from the drop down
Select course session check box and click the Destination lookup search icon
Select destination, language and click the Add Set Up and select Buttons
click the create button
Course deployment should be created
